name: @fav/text.repeat
description: Repeat the source string the given times.

scripts.web:build: browserify index.js --standalone fav.text.repeat -o web/fav.text.repeat.js && cd web && uglifyjs fav.text.repeat.js --compress --mangle -o fav.text.repeat.min.js --source-map url=fav.text.repeat.min.js.map && cd .. && node tool/make-web-test.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run web:build

author: Takayuki Sato
